name: places/ChIJ1yUGRR1ZwokRQwqRP3cV5rw
formattedAddress: 247 W 26th St, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 247 W 26th St, New York, NY 10001-6712, USA

originalText.text:
Normally, getting a manicure feels like a chore. That is not the case at Hue Nail Club. Booking an appointment is easy, they have mimosas/coffee/water when you arrive, you can watch Netflix with headphones if you don’t feel like socializing, and the staff is amazing.

I always schedule my appointment with Raven, she is a perfectionist and my nails look great every time! 10/10!

text.text:
Normally, getting a manicure feels like a chore. That is not the case at Hue Nail Club. Booking an appointment is easy, they have mimosas/coffee/water when you arrive, you can watch Netflix with headphones if you don’t feel like socializing, and the staff is amazing.

I always schedule my appointment with Raven, she is a perfectionist and my nails look great every time! 10/10!

originalText.text: After many years of searching, I finally found my spot, and more importantly, my person! Raven is the best nail tech I’ve ever been to - and the only one I’ve decided to come back to half a dozen times already. Her patience and attention to detail is second to none. My nails look the best they’ve ever looked, and my manicures last. I do structured gel - the perfect way to get my nails to grow out in a very natural looking way. No matter what I want color/design/shape-wise, Raven delivers. Despite all the cooking I do, my nails last without chipping or lifting. Also, I’d be remiss not to mention our fun chats - she is so much fun and the time flies by. Highly recommend!!

text.text: After many years of searching, I finally found my spot, and more importantly, my person! Raven is the best nail tech I’ve ever been to - and the only one I’ve decided to come back to half a dozen times already. Her patience and attention to detail is second to none. My nails look the best they’ve ever looked, and my manicures last. I do structured gel - the perfect way to get my nails to grow out in a very natural looking way. No matter what I want color/design/shape-wise, Raven delivers. Despite all the cooking I do, my nails last without chipping or lifting. Also, I’d be remiss not to mention our fun chats - she is so much fun and the time flies by. Highly recommend!!

originalText.text: Angel did such a good job! Not only was she amazing, but so was the nail salon in general. They offered a mimosa, tea, or water when I got there. They also gave me an iPad with headphones to watch Netflix during my appointment. It was a great touch, especially because it took around 2 hours. Angel was super friendly and detail oriented. An acrylic fill in with gel and gems ended up being $110, so not too bad! Very happy with my nails and I’ll definitely be coming back!

text.text: Angel did such a good job! Not only was she amazing, but so was the nail salon in general. They offered a mimosa, tea, or water when I got there. They also gave me an iPad with headphones to watch Netflix during my appointment. It was a great touch, especially because it took around 2 hours. Angel was super friendly and detail oriented. An acrylic fill in with gel and gems ended up being $110, so not too bad! Very happy with my nails and I’ll definitely be coming back!

originalText.text: Maria did such a fabulous job on my nails! Absolutely thrilled with my recent experience! The salon's attention to detail is unparalleled, creating a serene atmosphere that immediately put me at ease. Maria showcased impressive artistry, turning my nails into a canvas of elegance. Impeccable service from start to finish – my nails have never looked so stunning! Highly recommend having Maria do your nails!!

text.text: Maria did such a fabulous job on my nails! Absolutely thrilled with my recent experience! The salon's attention to detail is unparalleled, creating a serene atmosphere that immediately put me at ease. Maria showcased impressive artistry, turning my nails into a canvas of elegance. Impeccable service from start to finish – my nails have never looked so stunning! Highly recommend having Maria do your nails!!

originalText.text:
I loved my experience at Hue Nail Club. They do such a great job at setting the tone of relaxation and decompressing. The physical space is beautiful and chic. The personnel is amazing and friendly. I did my nails with Angie, and I will never go to anyone else. She asks questions to get to know you and to understand your expectations. She walks you through the process of what she’s doing and is constantly checking in to see how you’re feeling. She’s AMAZING! I loved the entire experience and can’t wait to go back!

PS. If you are looking for a place you can sit back and relax this is it.
